snippet: Chris Huhne on Monday pleaded guilty to obstructing justice by persuading his former wife to take responsibility for a speeding offense he had committed in 2003.
abstract: Chris Huhne announces his resignation from British Parliament after reversing his longstanding denials and accepting responsibility for persuading his former wife Vicky Pryce to take blame for speeding offense he had committed decade ago.
lead_paragraph: Chris Huhne on Monday pleaded guilty to obstructing justice by persuading his former wife to take responsibility for a speeding offense he had committed in 2003.

headline.seo: Chris Huhne Pleads Guilty to Charge of Obstructing Justice
headline.main: Ex-Official Pleads Guilty to Old Charge in Britain
headline.print_headline: Ex-Official Pleads Guilty To Old Charge In Britain
